content.rendered:
Step UP! and Bystander Intervention Stories

View the following videos for Step UP! program and related bystander intervention stories. Video links may take you out of the Step UP! website and to other sites where there are links and comments not affiliated with Step UP!

  • Awareness Test
    YouTube
  • Bystander Effect — People Watch Girl Being Abducted
    NBC Today
  • 1 is 2 Many – PSA on Domestic Violence
    YouTube
  • Bystander Effect – No one helps as 15 year old is gang raped in California
    CNN
  • Bystanders Lift Burning Car
    YouTube
  • “Snack Man” – A great example of creative intervention!
    YouTube
  • Video of a man being beaten and robbed with others watching
    YouTube
  • Obedience to Authority – Security Guards watch beating b/c they are told to only “observe and report”
    USA Today
  • The Smoke-Filled Room Study (Bystander Diffusion of Responsibility)
    YouTube
  • Stanford Prisoner Experiment: How Roles Can Affect Our Attitudes and Behaviors
    Stanford University / YouTube
  • What Would You Do?
    ABC News Feature with John Quiñones
  • Who Are You?
    Put yourself at this party – what actions would you take – and when?
